00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *file;
00028     unsigned char buf[600];
00029     long n;
00030     FILE *in;
00031     long len;
00032      struct List *list;
00033 
00034     adfEnvInitDefault();
00035 
00036 //  adfSetEnvFct(0,0,MyVer,0);
00037 
00038     /* mount existing device : FFS */
00039     hd = adfMountDev( "testffs.bak",FALSE );
00040     if (!hd) {
00041         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00042         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00043     }
00044 
00045     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00046     if (!vol) {
00047         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00048         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00049         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00050     }
00051 
00052     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00053 
00054     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00055     while(list) {
00056         printEntry(list->content);
00057         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00058         list = list->next;
00059     }
00060     freeList(list);
00061 
00062 //    adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_1a");
00063     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_1b");
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "newfile","w");
00068     adfCloseFile(file);
00069 
00070     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","w");
00071     if (!file) return 1;
00072     in = fopen("Check/MOON.GIF","rb");
00073     if (!in) return 1;
00074     
00075     len = 600;
00076     n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,in);
00077     while(!feof(in)) {
00078         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00079         n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,in);
00080     }
00081     if (n>0)
00082         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00083 
00084 //    adfFlushFile(file);
00085 
00086     adfCloseFile(file);
00087     fclose(in);
00088 
00089     adfRemoveEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr, "dir_1b");
00090 
00091     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00092     while(list) {
00093         printEntry(list->content);
00094         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00095         list = list->next;
00096     }
00097     freeList(list);
00098 
00099     adfUnMount(vol);
00100     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00101 
00102 
00103     adfEnvCleanUp();
00104 
00105     return 0;
00106 }
